verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses רְאֵ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> See נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <S%H5414><s%> I have made אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> thee a god לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> to Pharaoh וְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become נְבִיאֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5030><s%> shall be thy prophet

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You תְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> Thou shalt speak אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> i אֲצַוֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H6680><s%> all that I command וְאַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> thee and Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> thy brother יְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> shall speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> that he send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> out of his land

וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I אַקְשֶׁ֖ה <S%H7185><s%> And I will harden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <S%H7235><s%> and multiply אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹתֹתַ֛י <S%H226><s%> my signs וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹפְתַ֖י <S%H4159><s%> and my wonders בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יִשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> shall not hearken אֲלֵכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> when פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> But Pharaoh וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> unto you that I may lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> my hand בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> upon Egypt וְהוֹצֵאתִ֨י <S%H3318><s%> and bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִבְאֹתַ֜י <S%H6635><s%> mine armies אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֤י <S%H5971><s%> [and] my people בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בִּשְׁפָטִ֖ים <S%H8201><s%> judgments גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> by great

וְיָדְע֤וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD בִּנְטֹתִ֥י <S%H5186><s%> when I stretch forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian וְהוֹצֵאתִ֥י <S%H3318><s%> and bring out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִתּוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> from among

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> thus עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> them so did

וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שְׁמֹנִ֣ים <S%H8084><s%> [was] fourscore שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְאַֽהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three וּשְׁמֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years בְּדַבְּרָ֖ם <S%H1696><s%> when they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> and אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> and unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> When יְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> shall speak אֲלֵכֶ֤ם <S%H413><s%> about פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> When Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saying תְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> Shew לָכֶ֖ם מוֹפֵ֑ת <S%H4159><s%> a miracle וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> for you then thou shalt say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron קַ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטְּךָ֛ <S%H4294><s%> thy rod וְהַשְׁלֵ֥ךְ <S%H7993><s%> and cast לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> [it] before פַרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> may become לְתַנִּֽין׃ <S%H8577><s%> [and] it shall become a serpent

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> went in מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וַיַּ֣עַשׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> and they did כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> and thus כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> so as the LORD וַיַּשְׁלֵ֨ךְ <S%H7993><s%> cast down אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטֵּ֗הוּ <S%H4294><s%> his rod לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before פַרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became לְתַנִּֽין׃ <S%H8577><s%> and it became a serpent

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> also called גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Then Pharaoh לַֽחֲכָמִ֖ים <S%H2450><s%> the wise men וְלַֽמְכַשְּׁפִ֑ים <S%H3784><s%> and the sorcerers וַיַּֽעֲשׂ֨וּ <S%H6213><s%> they also did גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֵ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> like חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <S%H2748><s%> now the magicians מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּלַהֲטֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3858><s%> with their enchantments כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> in like manner

וַיַּשְׁלִ֙יכוּ֙ <S%H7993><s%> For they cast down אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man מַטֵּ֔הוּ <S%H4294><s%> his rod וַיִּהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> turned לְתַנִּינִ֑ם <S%H8577><s%> and they became serpents וַיִּבְלַ֥ע <S%H1104><s%> swallowed up מַטֵּֽה־ <S%H4294><s%> rod אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> but Aaron's אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטֹּתָֽם׃ <S%H4294><s%> their rods

וַיֶּחֱזַק֙ <S%H2388><s%> And he hardened לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> that he hearkened אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> not unto them as the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses כָּבֵ֖ד <S%H3515><s%> [is] hardened לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> Pharaoh's מֵאֵ֖ן <S%H3985><s%> he refuseth לְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> go הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> to let the people

לֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֞ה <S%H6547><s%> thee unto Pharaoh בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> lo he goeth out הַמַּ֔יְמָה <S%H4325><s%> unto the water וְנִצַּבְתָּ֥ <S%H5324><s%> and thou shalt stand לִקְרָאת֖וֹ <S%H7125><s%> against he come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> brink הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> by the river's וְהַמַּטֶּ֛ה <S%H4294><s%> and the rod אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that was נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> which was turned לְנָחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> to a serpent תִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> shalt thou take בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> And thou shalt say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God הָעִבְרִים֙ <S%H5680><s%> of the Hebrews שְׁלָחַ֤נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> to לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> me unto thee saying שַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> Let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻ֖נִי <S%H5647><s%> that they may serve בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> me in the wilderness וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׁמַ֖עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> thou wouldest not hear עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until כֹּֽה׃ <S%H3541><s%> and behold hitherto

כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> you תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> In this thou shalt know כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I מַכֶּ֣ה ׀ <S%H5221><s%> behold I will smite בַּמַּטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> with the rod אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> is in בְּיָדִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> that [is] in mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמַּ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> upon the waters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is in בַּיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> which [are] in the river וְנֶהֶפְכ֥וּ <S%H2015><s%> and they shall be turned לְדָֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> to blood

וְהַדָּגָ֧ה <S%H1710><s%> And the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that בַּיְאֹ֛ר <S%H2975><s%> that [is] in the river תָּמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> shall die וּבָאַ֣שׁ <S%H887><s%> shall stink הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> and the river וְנִלְא֣וּ <S%H3811><s%> shall lothe מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> are in הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> of the river ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> Take מַטְּךָ֣ <S%H4294><s%> thy rod וּנְטֵֽה־ <S%H5186><s%> and stretch out יָדְךָ֩ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over מֵימֵ֨י <S%H4325><s%> upon the waters מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> over נַהֲרֹתָ֣ם ׀ <S%H5104><s%> upon their streams עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְאֹרֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H2975><s%> upon their rivers וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over אַגְמֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H98><s%> and upon their ponds וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִקְוֵ֥ה <S%H4723><s%> and upon all their pools מֵימֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4325><s%> of water וְיִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> may become דָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> that they may become blood וְהָ֤יָה <S%H1961><s%> may become דָם֙ <S%H1818><s%> and [that] there may be blood בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּבָעֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> both in [vessels of] wood וּבָאֲבָנִֽים׃ <S%H68><s%> and in [vessels of] stone

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> even מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> so as the LORD וַיָּ֤רֶם <S%H7311><s%> and he lifted up בַּמַּטֶּה֙ <S%H4294><s%> the rod וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> the waters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that was בַּיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> that [were] in the river לְעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וּלְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> and in the sight עֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וַיֵּהָֽפְכ֛וּ <S%H2015><s%> were turned כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> and all the waters אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that was בַּיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> that [were] in the river לְדָֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> to blood

וְהַדָּגָ֨ה <S%H1710><s%> And the fish אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> were בַּיְאֹ֥ר <S%H2975><s%> that [was] in the river מֵ֙תָה֙ <S%H4191><s%> died וַיִּבְאַ֣שׁ <S%H887><s%> stank הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> and the river וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֣וּ <S%H3201><s%> could מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <S%H8354><s%> not drink מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> of the river וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become הַדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> and there was blood בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians

וַיַּֽעֲשׂוּ־ <S%H6213><s%> did כֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> the same חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <S%H2748><s%> And the magicians מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּלָטֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H3909><s%> so with their enchantments וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <S%H2388><s%> was hardened לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> heart פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> and Pharaoh's וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> neither did he hearken אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> had said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto them as the LORD

וַיִּ֣פֶן <S%H6437><s%> turned פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> And Pharaoh וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> into his house וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no שָׁ֥ת <S%H7896><s%> neither did he set לִבּ֖וֹ <S%H3820><s%> his heart גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even לָזֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> to this

וַיַּחְפְּר֧וּ <S%H2658><s%> digged כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian סְבִיבֹ֥ת <S%H5439><s%> round about הַיְאֹ֖ר <S%H2975><s%> the river מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> for water לִשְׁתּ֑וֹת <S%H8354><s%> to drink כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> for they could לִשְׁתֹּ֔ת <S%H8354><s%> not drink מִמֵּימֵ֖י <S%H4325><s%> of the water הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> of the river
